welcome_message_body: Welcome to Serang, Indonesia! Get ready to be captivated by the city's rich history, beautiful beaches, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Serang has to offer.

restaurants.name: Sari Kuring Indah Ciracas
restaurants.description: Sari Kuring Indah Ciracas is a sundanese restaurant located in Serang.
restaurants.address: Jl. Tb. Suwandi Lingk. Batok Bali Ciracas  Telp. 0254 213 444 Fax. 0254 228 555, Serang, Banten
